title: I got ban for comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive.  but i didn't

embed.description: ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm / Diamond 4 0LP / 342W 341L Win Ratio 50% / Kha'Zix - 87W 69L Win Ratio 56%, Diana - 90W 65L Win Ratio 58%, LeBlanc - 28W 21L Win Ratio 57%, Ahri - 26W 17L Win Ratio 60%, Caitlyn - 13W 15L Win Ratio 46%

body:
because a player- triggered review found you in game comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive, your account's been permanently suspended

i will show u something, then i will tell u what im try to say

Game 1 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: are u kidding me 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: elise 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: u shu tup 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: elise 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: whu tup 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: thats only time to kill her 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: cos u never help me 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: idiot 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: u should say thanks to urself 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: elise 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: i pinged u come to herer, but u farming 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: fuk off 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: i dont care.. 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: who u 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: who you 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: u cant understand? 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: can u learn more english 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: ye im feeding 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: let me show u real feeding 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: u dont help me 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: and laming me 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: report me for what 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: for im lose lane? 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: for u blaming me? 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: or for i didnt swap with u ? 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: elise and yasuo call me inting 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: u live with ur pissive 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: killing me with twich 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: ye 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: gg 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: ocean game 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: cos im diana 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: and elise 0 gank 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: :/

they are trash talk to me , and ask others for report me , i never feeding , isaid feeding cos im angry , but i never feeding,  i did best damage in our team ,
i saisd fuck off because our jg come to take my lane wave , taking my farm , means try to make me behind,  i cant do anything.
is this comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive?, can u review the in game chat full history, imean everyones talk , u will see the real comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive from our jg and top , , i was respect everyone , but they are not , they are try to makke me angry and ask for reports , i never talk to them at first, they are try to make me angry thats real comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive, i paid 3145 australian$ in my acc, because i love this game ,i was bought every new skin when new skin selling. i even saved 1900 rp for ahri new sin , now im getting in ban for comms extrmely inflammatory and offensive , my lol life over?? its funny, i think u are fair , i dont want making u busy work , but my acc is my all , now someone just made me get in ban , i lost everything, please riot , i didnt do omms extrmely inflammatory and offensive , i just a fucking student , can u give a fuck to a littl fucking student please, i am diamond4 , i never fucking boosting, i never do anything wrong, i just talking to them , and getting in ban , u dont need to thinking about what im saying now, u should just review the in game chat history,, pleaseeeeeeeeeeeeee riot pls， ye i said fuck off because elise taking my lane wave , i said idiot because elise tell me to stop feeding , but not i got comped , this is a big diffrent , elise call me feeding , so i said :ok i will show u real feeding , but i never feeding 1, u can just check replay , pls , i just want u be fair, i want u help me to be unbanner, if i have anywrong , i will change , but u cant banned me for last game , thanks alot hope , this is only hope, i dont want send a lot ticket to u guys, i dont want make u busy , but pls be fair.
